name: Tactical nuclear penguins vs walruses from the hood
name_original: Tactical nuclear penguins vs walruses from the hood
description:
Tactical nuclear penguins vs walruses from the hood is a shooter game developed by FrancescoTC. It came out on 17-12-2021.
Tactical nuclear penguins vs walruses from the hood is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
